Eiffel Tower.description: The most famous landmark in Paris, offering panoramic city views.
tips: Best visited early morning or late evening for fewer crowds.
Tickets can be booked online in advance.

Louvre Museum.description: World's largest art museum, home to the Mona Lisa and thousands of other masterpieces.
tips: Allocate at least 3-4 hours to explore.
Try visiting on Wednesday or Friday evenings for fewer visitors.

Arc de Triomphe.description: Iconic monument honoring those who fought for France, located at Place Charles de Gaulle.
tips: Climb to the top for a stunning view of Champs-Élysées.
